Concerns raised over abuse from intoxicated, mentally unwell people at Gisborne library https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/10/11/concerns-raised-over-abuse-from-intoxated-mentally-unwell-people-at-gisborne-library/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/10/11/concerns-raised-over-abuse-from-intoxated-mentally-unwell-people-at-gisborne-library/ Zita Campbell, Local Democracy ReporterBehaviours range from theft and fighting to using the outside of the building as a toilet. Photo / James Pocock

Jovan Pora sentenced over Boxing Day kidnapping where partner Katelyn Rua-Tuhou fell to death from moving car https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/jovan-pora-sentenced-over-boxing-day-kidnapping-where-partner-katelyn-rua-tuaou-fell-to-death-from-moving-汽车/5IGLKYRHFBGCFOBKJ6UIHJEGQU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/jovan-pora-sentenced-over-boxing-day-kidnapping-where-partner-katelyn-rua-tuaou-fell-to-death-from-moving-汽车/5IGLKYRHFBGCFOBKJ6UIHJEGQU/ Craig Kapitan, Katie Harris“I thought a grown man would run out of tears by now,” the victim's father said.
